GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article based on an article id

articles/1.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles/1.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id

articles/1/comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
articles/1/comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to the given article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes of the given article_id

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
